name: portfolio-website
description: A fast-loading static portfolio website built with vanilla JS, HTML, and SCSS

scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:html && npm run build:styles && npm run build:copy
scripts.build:copy: cp -r src/pages/* dist/ && cp -r src/scripts dist/ && cp -r src/translations dist/
scripts.dev: npm run build:html && npm run watch & npm run watch:html & npm run serve
